channel.title: [PI] Model on Interface

item.title: [PI] Model on Interface
item.dc:creator: @I_InDrEk_I I InDrEk I
item.description:
@I_InDrEk_I wrote:

Hello, can someone convert it to pi, please?

/** * Sends a model in an interface. * * @param id * The interface id. * @param zoom * The zoom. * @param model * The model id. * @return The action sender instance, for chaining. */ public ActionSender sendInterfaceModel(int id, int zoom, int model) { PacketBuilder bldr = new PacketBuilder(246); bldr.putLEShort(id).putShort(zoom).putShort(model); player.write(bldr.toPacket()); return this; }

Will rep++

Read full topic
